title: Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve
title_original: BTFBM Womens Sweaters Quarter Zip Pullover V Neck Collar Long Sleeve Ribbed Knit Loose Casual 2025 Winter Fall Sweater

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #14,504 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #239 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made and appreciate its style, with one noting it looks cute both unzipped and zipped, and another mentioning its flattering collar design. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it perfectly sized while others note it runs very oversized.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort & Quality
items.body: This sweater is so comfortable! The material is great quality, soft, and doesn't seem likely to pill quickly. It's warm but not too warm. It arrived yesterday and I'm wearing it for the second day! Lol! I'm 5'3, 138 lbs and bought a small. The fit is perfect. Sleeve comes down to the knuckle of my thumb, so if you are taller go with a medium. Read more
items.author: andrea nicole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT and SOFT!!
items.body: OK WOW - Super soft, beautifully made with thicker cuffs adding a cool dimension and again, oh so soft. The zipper is a 1/2 zipper so lots of room to have it zipped high or low and the navy color is a true navy. A white tank under it, zipper down is so cute. The material is so nice that the bottom half lays beautifully on my jeans...not bulky. And tucking it in my jeans in front is super cute. I decided to purchase it because a reviewer said it was thin enough to tuck and sure enough, it was. Tucking in a thick sweater does not look right and this tucked looks SO CUTE. I have not felt this motivated to write a review in a long time but this sweater deserved 5 stars! Read more
items.author: RS

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality, Oversized
items.body: The quality of this sweater upon opening looks really good. It's SUPER soft. On the thinner side but not in a cheap way. It will be great for layering. The color (I got burgundy) is rich - hoping it doesn't bleed! I will say, it is quite oversized. I got a small (5'5 / 127lbs) and it's very loose, especially on the bottom. I've read it may shrink a little so we'll see after I wash it. I'm going to keep it regardless because it's very cozy and good quality. If I end up liking it, I might order another and size down for an alternate fit. Read more
items.author: TheActOfStyle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best winter sweater
items.body: My favorite sweater this winter. Fits true to size, comfortable and looks great on. Read more
items.author: Deborah Oust

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fair quality
items.body: Color is great and decent quality fabric but zipper is not nearly as shown. It's very short. Overall fit is good and comfortable. Weight is good; not too heavy. Read more
items.author: Calireyna

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft sweater!
items.body: Very very soft, very flattering shape, love the collar and the length of the sleeves, all in all just a really nice comfy sweater at a great price. My only criticism is that the green is less flattering than I'd hoped, more army green like the name than dark green like the pictures. I'm still keeping it, and probably buying another color, but I just wanted to mention that: army green matches the name and not the photos. Read more
items.author: Tawn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: Love this so much I have already ordered another. Great fit, super cute. Warm but not too warm. Read more
items.author: SMA3

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars This sweater balls up and snags easily. Not a good knit.
items.body: I wish I could return this sweater. It balls up and snags so easily. I didn't wear it until now and it's too late to return it. I also ordered it in another color. It is the same knit so I know I will have the same problem with it. Read more
items.author: Don Swain

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dark Grey, Grey Blue, Army Green, Light Green, Black, Light Blue, Rose Red, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
